prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with a sleek metallic body and glowing red eyes.
Imagine a small, robotic Pokemon that can fly and has a shiny silver surface.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a mechanical creature, with accents of yellow and black.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a futuristic drone, perfect for urban environments.
Show me a Pokemon with a round, compact body and a unique ability to float.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of technology, with a minimalist design.
Give me a vision of a Pokemon that can evolve into a powerful machine-like creature.
